comments:
Opened for IBM (Jason Sholl) on WTP 512:  (may be related to EMF2DOMRenderer being used instead of EMF2DOMSSERender...


I'm not sure why this started happening; everything was working before, but now, every time I create a new EJB project in IBM product, the EJB validator dies when trying to validate because the ejb-jar.xml file is not DTD valid.  There are lots of exceptions like the one below.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.validation 4 0 2006-05-22 14:11:08.602
!MESSAGE
*** ERROR ***: Mon May 22 14:11:08 EDT 2006    org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.core.ValidationException: IWAE0053E A
n internal error has occurred running validation on project:TestItEAR]:TestItEAR, check the log file for details
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.model.internal.validation.EarValidator.validateInJob(EarValidator.java:165)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.validation.UIEarValidator.validateInJob(UIEarValidator.java:217)
        at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.operations.ValidatorJob.run(ValidatorJob.java:70)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.validation 4 0 2006-05-22 14:11:08.612
!MESSAGE
*** ERROR ***: Mon May 22 14:11:08 EDT 2006    org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.exception.DeploymentDescr
iptorLoadException: META-INF/application.xml
    Stack trace of nested exception:
    org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.exception.ResourceLoadException: IWAE0007E Could not load resource "
META-INF/application.xml" in archive "[/TestItEAR]:TestItEAR"

element 'application' is not complete. One of '{"http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee":display-name, "http://java.sun.com/xml
/ns/j2ee":icon, "http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee":module}' is expected.

The problem is in the IBM driver, it is not a WTP issue.
